metadata.name: HackTool - SharPersist Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of the hacktool SharPersist - used to deploy various different kinds of persistence mechanisms

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\sharpersist.exe')) AND lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('sharpersist') OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -t schtask -c ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -t startupfolder -c ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -t reg -c ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -m add')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -t service -c ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -m add')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -t schtask -c ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -m add'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of the hacktool SharPersist - used to deploy various different kinds of persistence mechanisms
